jobDescription: Summary: Data Trust is currently seeking a Data Operations Analyst, a full-time position, who will work with the data operations team. The Data Operations Analyst is responsible for helping to create and manage the maintenance and development of the processes associated with our underlying databases. Responsibilities:Develop data flow processesResearch and implement features to improve the efficiency and reliability of the data infrastructureAssist coworkers in writing efficient queriesResearch and implement features to improve the efficiency and reliability of the data infrastructureQualifications:Experience with SQL is required.Experience with other programing languages, including, but not limited to, Python, R, C#, and C++ is helpful, but not required.Able to diagnose and troubleshoot database related problems
